m_szDocTitle: Telepresence robot with a printer - Intouch Technologies, Inc.
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Telepresence robot with a printer United States Patent 8116910 Abstract: A remote controlled robot system that includes a robot and a remote controlled station. The robot includes a camera and a printer coupled to a mobile platform. The remote control station may display one or more graphical user interfaces with data fields. The graphical user interfaces allow a user to enter information into the data fields. The information is then transmitted to the robot and printed by the robot printer. The information may include a medical prescription and the name of the
